General.Name: Honey Hope Honesty Enterprise Co Ltd
General.Description: Honey Hope Honesty Enterprise Co.,Ltd engages in trading of electronic components in Taiwan and internationally. The company offers multilayer capacitors, chip inductors, chip displacement, high-frequency chip inductors, etc. It serves PC, notebook, TFT-LCD, mobile phones, network equipment, communications equipment, wireless local area network, and information industry peripheral equipment manufacturers. The company was founded in 1989 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.
